bibl.title: A Reexamination of the Text of P. Oxy. 2949.
bibl.note: Critique de l'article de: Paul Foster, Are there any Early Fragments of the So-Called Gospel of Peter? Avec résumé en anglais, NTS 52 (2006) pp. 1-28, 3 tabl., 4 figg. - P. Oxy. XLI, 2949 (= van Haelst 592; LDAB 5111). - 1. The text. - 2. P. Oxy. 2949 and the Akhmîm Codex [P. Cair. Inv. 10759 (= van Haelst 598; LDAB 1088).]. - 3. Conclusion. - Voir: Paul Foster, A Reexamination of the Text of P. Oxy. 2949, JBL 129 (2010) pp. 173-176.
bibl.seg: Wayment Thomas A., A Reexamination of the Text of P. Oxy. 2949.
